modules.description: Implements the Keva stemming algorithm for Russian and Ukrainian text, processing CP-1251 encoded strings. Uses an internal state object to manage stemming operations. Ideal for text normalization in search engines or NLP pipelines handling Cyrillic languages.

Implements the Porter2 stemming algorithm for reducing English words to their root forms. Operates on strings, transforming them into stemmed equivalents using a stateful handle. Useful for text normalization in search engines, NLP pipelines, and document indexing.

This module provides stemming functionality for multiple languages using stateful algorithms. It supports the Keva algorithm for Russian and Ukrainian text in CP-1251 encoding, and the Porter2 algorithm for English, both operating on strings to produce normalized word roots. You can process Cyrillic-encoded text for search engines or apply English stemming to improve document indexing and NLP tasks. For example, "running" becomes "run" and "документы" becomes "документ" after stemming.
